message:
if anyone used Drupal
I have a project with much content that needs to be updated frequently and I think Drupal is a good selection for this but I have also some parts that are dynamic and need high customization, will drupal help in this or it will take a lot of time to customize under Drupal??
thanks in advance!

data.message: U can customize anything in Drupal if u know hw to do it...Drupal is very flexible !

Exactly 
Drupal can be customized to do anything as long as you know your way around it
There is always a lot of ways to do the same thing in drupal, use the right way and the performance will be good

after about a week now with Drupal
it can be extremely customized to do anything and it's performance is good as long as you follow the standards 
but I see that customizing and dynamic stuff under Drupal will cost time more than building your solution from scratch
